instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 battery boot problem
threads.message:
No liquid damage board looks good. If powered on with just the battery alone the progress bar will load almost all the way but just continue to hang. As soon as the machine is plugged in the boot process finishes seconds later.  Battery is good.

Does this sound like BIOS issue or U7000?

threads.title: 820-2936 battery boot problem
threads.message: Did you try known good battery (even old), or just "new"?

threads.title: 820-2936 battery boot problem
threads.message: Does the same behavior with 3 different batteries. Batteries work and boot fine in other MacBook

threads.title: 820-2936 battery boot problem
threads.message:
Did PRAM reset?
You can try BIOS, just in case.

Run corresponding EFI ASD, for more information.
